resources.string:
To get information about an A&A unit image, press on that unit image for half a second and a box will appear that displays the name, attack, defense, and cost of that unit. 

This app does not incorporate the research and development chart for cheaper units. If you would like to see this functionality please comment on the play store about this. 

About the developer: I am a huge fan of the Axis and Allies series and I personally use this app every time I play because I found that cash or using a notepad is tedious. I hope you can get some good use out of this app! 

And remember to bomb the harbor!
